data: Embedded Systems, Microchips, FreeRTOS, CAN bus

data.name: Web Development
points: Building resume website from scratch as a self-started project
Completed course work that introduced me to React/Express/Node
Hosting stie using Azure. Currently learning Azure's CosmosDB and MongoDB
Learning from documentation, the internet, AI, and trial and error

data.name: Linux Development
points: Worked on Linux Kernel modules for 50 year old hardware
Debugged C code, reverse engineering to create diagram of how code worked
Wrote Linux C utilities that interfaced with OS system calls
Worked with team of observatory staff engineers and fellow students remotely

data.name: IT Work
points: Installed end user systems and point of sales machiens in new office space
Interacted with customers, fulfilled requests and explained things simply
Reinstalled Windows 10 environment, optimizing it to run fast on old hardware
Installed Ethernet switch and cables, set up new private network

data.name: Software Engineering Intern
points: Modified microcontroller C code on natural gas engine control unit
Increased efficiency, speed, and robustness of I2C protocol implementation by reprogramming it to be interrupt driven instead of blocking
Added functionality for ECU to run without HMI by modifying digital and analog I/O handling, FreeRTOS operating system, and CAN bus data
Wrote unit tests in code base, and ran integration testing on engine
Collaborated with senior engineers through digital messages and oral communication. Prepared questions and progress reports for meetings

data.name: Co-Owner
points: Independently operated and maintained mobile kitchen and staff
Innovated business ideas and recipes based off of customer feedback
Introduced to business planning and financing in entrepreneurial setting
Prioritized clientele's satisfaction, ensuring their return for business

data.name: Sound & Lighting Technician
points: Professionally set up stages for concerts & PA systems for events on UW campus
Addressed and programmed lights using various lighting consoles
Wired anlog and digital audio channels from instruments to mixer & effects
Performed maintenance and troubleshooting on hardware and software

data.name: Bartender
points: Provided Quality customer service in a fast-paced enviroment
Worked during free time throughout college to pay my own way through school
Learned time managment skills to balance work and school

data.name: Roofer
